snippet: The three are accused in the June killings of 22 people in western Mexico, Attorney General Jesús Murillo Karam announced on Tuesday.
abstract: Three soldiers are charged with homicide in June killings of 22 people in western Mexico; security analysts and human rights advocates react to decision with skepticism and scorn, saying verdict does little to illuminate details of massacre.
lead_paragraph: The three are accused in the June killings of 22 people in western Mexico, Attorney General Jesús Murillo Karam announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: 3 Soldiers Are Charged With Homicide in Mexico Killings
headline.print_headline: 3 Soldiers Are Charged With Homicide in Mexico Killings

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
